description: Twenty-five years after commiting a double murder, Karl Childers is going to be released from an institution for the criminally insane. A local reporter comes to talk to him, and after some fussing about her gender, the institutio...
keywords: precursor to motion picture,independent film,title spoken by character,cult film,sexist
name: Some Folks Call It a Sling Blade

original_info.id: Some Folks Call it a Sling Blade_1993
original_info.name: Some Folks Call it a Sling Blade

review.name: Rehearsal for the real movie
review.reviewBody: I saw this movie when I rented a DVD that came with a lot of brief "movies" such as this. I wonder if it was done to show the head of a studio what a great feature length movie this would make. I enjoyed the short story format and was impressed with Molly Ringwold's acting.
